paper_abstract: We present a randomized procedure named Hierarchical Sampling from Sketches (HSS) that can be used for estimating a class of functions over the frequency vector f of update streams of the form Psi (S) = Sigma(n)(i=1) psi(vertical bar f(i vertical bar)). We illustrate this by applying the HSS technique to design nearly space-optimal algorithms for estimating the pth moment of the frequency vector, for real p >= 2 and for estimating the entropy of a data stream.
paper_title: Hierarchical Sampling from Sketches: Estimating Functions over Data Streams
